segments.text: Ugh, that sink is disgusting with water spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and making a filthy puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, tracking water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids climbing for cookiesâ€” so grubby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's all wobbly, covered in who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sticking hands in the jar, maybe dirty ones.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just begging for a share, ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's open, but it can't air out this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything's going to smell damp and moldy soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a nasty, careless scene this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
